member.name: D2D1_SWEEP_DIRECTION
member.summary: Defines the direction that an elliptical arc is drawn.

member.name: D2D1_SWEEP_DIRECTION.D2D1_SWEEP_DIRECTION_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE
member.summary: Arcs are drawn in a counterclockwise (negative-angle) direction.

member.name: D2D1_SWEEP_DIRECTION.D2D1_SWEEP_DIRECTION_CLOCKWISE
member.summary: Arcs are drawn in a clockwise (positive-angle) direction.
